about_the_game:
A set of Sepith ore items used to synthesize quartz.
Sepith can be used in quartz synthesis or to power up slots.
Sepith Lumps can be redeemed for mira.
Earth Sepith x1000
Water Sepith x1000
Fire Sepith x1000
Wind Sepith x1000
Time Sepith x1000
Space Sepith x1000
Mirage Sepith x1000
Sepith Lump x1000

A set of a rare material that can be used to strengthen weapons or trade for quartz or other items.
U-Material x50
U-Material+ x10

A set of monster ingredients essential for cooking.
Beast Flesh x40
High-Grade Beast Flesh x20
Beast Extract x40
High-Grade Beast Extract x20

A set of advanced medicine that will come in handy in a pinch.
Tear All Balm x10
EP Charge IV x10
Celestial Balm EX x10

A 10-pack of a rare recovery item that revives, fully heals, and grants 100 CP.
Zelam Powder x10

A 10-pack of a rare recovery item that revives, fully heals, and grants 200 CP.
Zelam Capsule x10

If used during battle, a Shining Pom will appear. After the battle, your party members' levels will increase by 1.
Shining Pom Fruit x9

A set of valuable items the player character can use to raise his/her stats.
Life Droplet x10
Power Droplet x10
Defense Droplet x10
Magic Droplet x10
Spirit Droplet x10

This item grants the user EXP and can be used to raise ally stats.
Kuro Miracle Elixir x50

A great value set of quartz and accessories for your adventures.
Action 2 x1
Freezing Blade x1
Wind Spirit Poem x1
Yellow Pendulum x1
Red Medallion x1

A set of refinement stones that can be used to enhance crafts.
Red Refinement Stone x50
Blue Refinement Stone x50
Green Refinement Stone x50
Gold Refinement Stone x50

*Can also be obtained in-game.
*Open [DLC] under the [Item] page in the main menu and select new items to receive them.
*Digital Ultimate Edition and Ultimate Upgrade Pack are also available. Beware of duplicate purchases.
